networksession-desc: Adde un SessionProvider a base del adresse IP e clave secrete configurate
networksession-only-api-request: Le autorisation NetworkSession es solmente valide pro requestas API.
networksession-only-https: Le autorisation NetworkSession es solmente valide pro requestas HTTPS.
networksession-invalid-config-ip-ranges: Le valor <var>ip_ranges</var> configurate in NetworkSessionProvider debe esser un matrice (''array'').
networksession-invalid-config-token: Le valor <var>token</var> configurate in NetworkSessionProvider debe esser un catena de characteres.
networksession-invalid-config-username: Le valor <var>username</var> configurate in NetworkSessionProvider debe esser un catena de characteres.
networksession-invalid-config-multiple-m: Plure usatores configurate corresponde al requesta, ma solmente un es permittite.
networksession-no-token-match: Le authentication con le token de autorisation NetworkSession fornite ha fallite.
